name: HTTPCookie
desc: A representation of an HTTP cookie.

items.name: requestHeaderFields
items.desc: Converts an array of cookies to a dictionary of header fields.

items.name: isSessionOnly
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the cookie should be discarded at the end of the session (regardless of expiration date).

items.name: isHTTPOnly
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the cookie should only be sent to HTTP servers.

items.name: isSecure
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the cookie may only be sent over secure channels.

items.name: sameSitePolicy
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to restrict the cookie to requests sent back to the same site that created it.

items.name: HTTPCookie.AcceptPolicy
items.desc: Cookie acceptance policies implemented by the HTTPCookieStorage class.

items.name: s HTTPCookieStorage
items.desc: A container that manages the storage of cookies.
